# Final Words

Thank you all for participating in this workshop on "Building an Enterprise GIS Workflow with QGIS and PostGIS." We've covered a lot of ground today, from the basics of spatial databases and QGIS, to advanced techniques such as data modeling and even touched upon on concepts as triggers.

## Key Takeaways:

-   Understanding the fundamentals of QGIS and PostGIS for enterprise-level solutions.

-   exploring what data modelling means in the context of spatial databases.

-   Delving into the art of utilizing lookup tables and constraints for data integrity.

## Next Steps:

-   For a deeper dive into any of the topics covered, we recommend exploring the official documentation for [QGIS](https://qgis.org/en/docs/index.html) and [PostGIS](https://postgis.net/docs/).

-   Join community forums or online groups specializing in GIS technologies to stay up-to-date and network with like-minded professionals.

-   See also which training courses could help in your journey towards becoming a FOSS4G expert: <https://www.gispo.fi/en/training/>

## Feedback:
